title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push, create, list, copy, delete, and show models with a simple Python client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; same CRUD operations as the Python client but for Node and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, retrieval, and tool-calling workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing chat, generate, pull, and embedding endpoints with fluent builders.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate providing typed wrappers over Ollama’s REST API with Tokio support.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax-highlighted REPL, history, and plugin system written in Go.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and model cache on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop app for chatting with Ollama models, packaged for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in deepset Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async/await, streaming, and strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-direnv
summary: Direnv plugin that automatically pulls and caches the required Ollama model when you enter a project directory.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama server and CLI, allowing declarative installs and model definitions in configuration.nix.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images for Ollama with CUDA and ROCm variants, plus compose examples.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command to query local models with per-channel model selection.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app for starting/stopping Ollama server and switching models from the status bar.
